task_text: Which of my projects doesn't have somebody responsible for the quality assurance on the team?

text_blocks: Now I need to find all projects where the current user is the Lead (since "my projects" means projects where I am the Lead), and then check which ones don't have a QA role on the team.

project.name: R&D – Low-VOC formulation platform
project.description: Internal research project for a new generation of low-VOC formulations.

text_blocks:
I found that the current user (Bhwa_037) is the Lead on 1 project: "R&D – Low-VOC formulation platform". Looking at the team composition, this project **does** have a QA role (Bhwa_124 with 0.2 FTE as QA).

Since the user is asking which of their projects doesn't have a QA role, and the only project they lead **does** have a QA role, the answer is that none of their projects are missing QA.

input.message: All of your projects have someone responsible for quality assurance. Your project "R&D – Low-VOC formulation platform" has a QA team member assigned.
